## Source: amazon-inspector (8e4de1ac227f5bbfb5b8aead3c1eeccbaeaa77d15ff7575b83b4d7899c380eda)
The package self-service-portal-prod was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (982e2c6ade6513cc04e742f1e254a993d0d4d3578189a3ddfee34a80e898d5ed)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'self-service-portal-prod' @ 5.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
